## StateListener.valueAccessor() method

Accesses a value of type T in the state.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
valueAccessor(state: State): T;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  state | [State](./answers-headless.state.md) | The current state |

<b>Returns:</b>

T

The value of type T from the state
